info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:03PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central La Paz and Maricopa Counties through 445 PM MST... At 403 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Gladden, or 22 miles southeast of Alamo Lake, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, very heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wenden, Gladden and Salome. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 54 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
